title: 64: Blake's Marriage (of Heaven and Hell)
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: William Blake was a printer and a precursor to the Romantics. In this episode, we discuss his "Marriage of Heaven and Hell."
itunes:author: Bees, Trees, and Fleas
itunes:subtitle: Isn't that called purgatory?
itunes:summary: William Blake was a printer and a precursor to the Romantics. In this episode, we discuss his "Marriage of Heaven and Hell."
